name: Average Clicking Game
description:
It's like, a really normal clicker game! Original.. I know. ;)

Update PreAlpha:002 Additions: Added music and a toggle button for it. Changes: Changed the background to fit the thumbnail. Tweaked button sizes and UI Placements. Bug Fixes: Fixed Scaling hiding buttons if the screen was too small, and the scaling in general. PreAlpha:003 Planned Additions: Cap for $2,147,483,647. Icons instead of plain buttons. Upgrade Formula Tweak. Cross Update Compatibility Improvements.

It's like in really early alpha but here's what it contains:

  • Clickable Button x2.
  • Abritary Numbers.
  • Reset Data.
  • Upgrades... Which is just one button, lol.

That's all! So yeah... It'll get bigger.
